parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the user. It's a 12-digit number.

parameters.name: BudgetName
parameters.description: A string that represents the budget name. The ':' and '" characters, and the '/action/' substring, aren't allowed.

parameters.name: ActionId
parameters.description: A system-generated universally unique identifier (UUID) for the action.

parameters.name: ActionThreshold
parameters.description: The trigger threshold of the action. The threshold of a notification. The type of threshold for a notification.

nested_params.name: ActionThresholdType
nested_params.description: The type of threshold for a notification.

parameters.name: Definition
parameters.description: Specifies all of the type-specific parameters. IamActionDefinition (dict) --- The Identity and Access Management (IAM) action definition details. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy to be attached. Roles (list) --- A list of roles to be attached. There must be at least one role. (string) --- Groups (list) --- A list of groups to be attached. There must be at least one group. (string) --- Users (list) --- A list of users to be attached. There must be at least one user. (string) --- ScpActionDefinition (dict) --- The service control policies (SCPs) action definition details. The policy ID attached. A list of target IDs. (string) --- SsmActionDefinition (dict) --- The Amazon Web Services Systems Manager (SSM) action definition details. The action subType. The Region to run the SSM document. The EC2 and RDS instance IDs. (string) ---

nested_params.name: IamActionDefinition
nested_params.description: The Identity and Access Management (IAM) action definition details.

nested_params.name: PolicyArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the policy to be attached.

nested_params.name: Roles
nested_params.description: A list of roles to be attached. There must be at least one role.

nested_params.name: Groups
nested_params.description: A list of groups to be attached. There must be at least one group.

nested_params.name: Users
nested_params.description: A list of users to be attached. There must be at least one user.

nested_params.name: ScpActionDefinition
nested_params.description: The service control policies (SCPs) action definition details.

nested_params.name: SsmActionDefinition
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services Systems Manager (SSM) action definition details.

nested_params.name: Region
nested_params.description: The Region to run the SSM document.

nested_params.name: InstanceIds
nested_params.description: The EC2 and RDS instance IDs.

parameters.name: Subscribers
parameters.description: A list of subscribers. (dict) --- The subscriber to a budget notification. The subscriber consists of a subscription type and either an Amazon SNS topic or an email address. For example, an email subscriber has the following parameters: A subscriptionType of EMAIL An address of example@example.com The type of notification that Amazon Web Services sends to a subscriber. The address that Amazon Web Services sends budget notifications to, either an SNS topic or an email. When you create a subscriber, the value of Address can't contain line breaks.

nested_items.name: BudgetName
nested_items.description: A string that represents the budget name. The ':' and '" characters, and the '/action/' substring, aren't allowed.

nested_items.name: NotificationType
nested_items.description: The type of a notification. It must be ACTUAL or FORECASTED.

nested_items.name: ActionType
nested_items.description: The type of action. This defines the type of tasks that can be carried out by this action. This field also determines the format for definition.

nested_items.description: The trigger threshold of the action.

nested_items.name: ActionThresholdValue
nested_items.description: The threshold of a notification.

nested_items.name: ActionThresholdType
nested_items.description: The type of threshold for a notification.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The role passed for action execution and reversion. Roles and actions must be in the same account.

nested_items.name: ApprovalModel
nested_items.description: This specifies if the action needs manual or automatic approval.

nested_items.description: The status of the action.
